outcome: Branch B: Patchwork City. Rival Council factions rush to implement their own fixes for the broken BCI, causing neighborhoods to experience conflicting policies and wildly fluctuating compliance scores. Fragmented governance breeds barter economies and new zones of power.

events.description: Residents in central districts discover BCI enforcement is drastically inconsistent. Some blocks experience tightened controls, others total leniency. Rumors spread of neighboring areas with different rules.
Civic forums fill with confusion and barter. People cross boundaries to access goods and services or to escape stricter oversight. Small black markets and swap networks take root.
The Directorate blames Harmonists and Innovators for policy chaos. Calls mount internally for one faction to seize centralized control and restore citywide order.
A pilot district, patched with fragments of Halden's code by Daria Tomenko, becomes a haven of calm amid chaos. Migrants flood in seeking stability, while factions debate the meaning of this zone.

Ordinary life splits: some live under strict rules, others in near-anarchy, and some in the pilot zone of fragile calm. Trust in BCI collapses as people gravitate toward whatever power offers security or freedom.
